title: Optimizing interface concentration and electric fields for enhanced lithium deposition behavior in lithium metal anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5993-6002
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01816H, Paper
Jiaxiang Liu, Haiming Hua, Jie Lin, Yongliang Deng, Nanbiao Pei, Peng Zhang, Jin-Chao Dong, Jian-Feng Li, Jinbao Zhao
A high-anion-concentration interface, immobilizing a high concentration of anions at electrolyte/electrode interface, can alleviate formation of space charge layer with uneven electric field distribution and inhibit the growth of Li dendrites.
